name: Object accessing database
description: List object directly having a direct connection to the database
request:
MATCH (o:Object:`%APPLICATION_NAME%`)-[]->(t:Object:`%APPLICATION_NAME%`) WHERE NOT o.Type CONTAINS $Type AND t.Type CONTAINS $Type 
RETURN DISTINCT o.FullName as SourceObject, o.Name as SourceName, o.Type as SourceType, t.FullName as DatabaseFullName, t.Name as DatabaseName, t.Type as DatabaseType;
